metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2014:0298-1 -- Recommended update for kvm
metadata.description:
This update for KVM provides support for the Ceph components of SUSE Cloud by implementing compatibility with a dynamically loaded rbd plug-in. Currently, this plug-in is not delivered with SUSE Linux Enterprise Server. (FATE#316580, bnc#858858)
Additionally, the following issues have been fixed:
* Provide dummy color map for VNC viewers which may request a color map. (bnc#842088) * Allow cross migration from SP2's qemu-kvm 0.15 to qemu 1.4. (bnc#812836, bnc#841080) * Fix potential rtl8139/pcnet network stalls. * Update to new s390-ccw.img firmware from v1.6.0. (bnc#812983) * Add fix for virtio-ccw reset. (bnc#812983)
